verses.verse: Now <WH6258> gather thyself in troops, <WH1413> O daughter <WH1323> of troops: <WH1416> he hath laid <WH7760> siege <WH4692> against <WH5921> us: they shall smite <WH5221> <WH853> the judge <WH8199> of Israel <WH3478> with a rod <WH7626> upon <WH5921> the cheek. <WH3895>

But thou, <WH859> Bethlehem <WH1035> Ephratah, <WH672> though thou be <WH1961> little <WH6810> among the thousands <WH505> of Judah, <WH3063> yet out of <WH4480> thee shall he come forth <WH3318> unto me that is to be <WH1961> ruler <WH4910> in Israel; <WH3478> whose goings forth <WH4163> have been from of old, <WH4480> <WH6924> from everlasting. <WH4480> <WH3117> <WH5769>

Therefore <WH3651> will he give them up, <WH5414> until <WH5704> the time <WH6256> that she which travaileth <WH3205> hath brought forth: <WH3205> then the remnant <WH3499> of his brethren <WH251> shall return <WH7725> unto <WH5921> the children <WH1121> of Israel. <WH3478>

And he shall stand <WH5975> and feed <WH7462> in the strength <WH5797> of the LORD, <WH3068> in the majesty <WH1347> of the name <WH8034> of the LORD <WH3068> his God; <WH430> and they shall abide: <WH3427> for <WH3588> now <WH6258> shall he be great <WH1431> unto <WH5704> the ends <WH657> of the earth. <WH776>

And this <WH2088> man shall be <WH1961> the peace, <WH7965> when <WH3588> the Assyrian <WH804> shall come <WH935> into our land: <WH776> and when <WH3588> he shall tread <WH1869> in our palaces, <WH759> then shall we raise <WH6965> against <WH5921> him seven <WH7651> shepherds, <WH7462> and eight <WH8083> principal <WH5257> men. <WH120>

And they shall waste <WH7489> <WH853> the land <WH776> of Assyria <WH804> with the sword, <WH2719> and the land <WH776> of Nimrod <WH5248> in the entrances <WH6607> thereof: thus shall he deliver <WH5337> us from <WH4480> the Assyrian, <WH804> when <WH3588> he cometh <WH935> into our land, <WH776> and when <WH3588> he treadeth <WH1869> within our borders. <WH1366>

And the remnant <WH7611> of Jacob <WH3290> shall be <WH1961> in the midst <WH7130> of many <WH7227> people <WH5971> as a dew <WH2919> from <WH4480> <WH854> the LORD, <WH3068> as the showers <WH7241> upon <WH5921> the grass, <WH6212> that <WH834> tarrieth <WH6960> not <WH3808> for man, <WH376> nor <WH3808> waiteth <WH3176> for the sons <WH1121> of men. <WH120>

And the remnant <WH7611> of Jacob <WH3290> shall be <WH1961> among the Gentiles <WH1471> in the midst <WH7130> of many <WH7227> people <WH5971> as a lion <WH738> among the beasts <WH929> of the forest, <WH3293> as a young lion <WH3715> among the flocks <WH5739> of sheep: <WH6629> who, <WH834> if <WH518> he go through, <WH5674> both treadeth down, <WH7429> and teareth in pieces, <WH2963> and none <WH369> can deliver. <WH5337>
Thine hand <WH3027> shall be lifted up <WH7311> upon <WH5921> thine adversaries, <WH6862> and all <WH3605> thine enemies <WH341> shall be cut off. <WH3772>

And it shall come to pass <WH1961> in that <WH1931> day, <WH3117> saith <WH5002> the LORD, <WH3068> that I will cut off <WH3772> thy horses <WH5483> out of the midst <WH4480> <WH7130> of thee, and I will destroy <WH6> thy chariots: <WH4818>
And I will cut off <WH3772> the cities <WH5892> of thy land, <WH776> and throw down <WH2040> all <WH3605> thy strongholds: <WH4013>
And I will cut off <WH3772> witchcrafts <WH3785> out of thine hand; <WH4480> <WH3027> and thou shalt have <WH1961> no <WH3808> more soothsayers: <WH6049>

Thy graven images <WH6456> also will I cut off, <WH3772> and thy standing images <WH4676> out of the midst <WH4480> <WH7130> of thee; and thou shalt no <WH3808> more <WH5750> worship <WH7812> the work <WH4639> of thine hands. <WH3027>
And I will pluck up <WH5428> thy groves <WH842> out of the midst <WH4480> <WH7130> of thee: so will I destroy <WH8045> thy cities. <WH5892>
And I will execute <WH6213> vengeance <WH5359> in anger <WH639> and fury <WH2534> upon <WH853> the heathen, <WH1471> such as <WH834> they have not <WH3808> heard. <WH8085>
